lead_paragraph: LYNN--Margaret Mount, 68, passed away peacefully at her home in Stamford, CT on February 19, 2016. Daughter of Richard and Frances Mount, Marge grew up in Emerson, NJ and attended Immaculate Heart Academy. She graduated from The College of New Rochelle in 1969, and also received Master's degrees from George Washington University and C.W. Post. After her marriage to James C. Lynn in 1974, Marge worked as middle school librarian at The Chapin School. In 1988, Margaret joined the faculty of Gill Library at The College of New Rochelle, eventually becoming Associate Dean of the Library in 2004, until her retirement in 2014. Marge always maintained a positive outlook on life; was respectful to all; encouraging to co-workers; and, most importantly, was a compassionate and loyal friend. Burial at Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY. Donations to the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society (www.lls.org) 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LYNN, MARGARET MOUNT
